        public Command nextMove()

                        EndOfGameException
        Increases moveIndex, gets the move from gameNotation, finds the right figure to do the move and does the move
        Specified by:
        nextMove in interface Game
        Returns:

        Throws:
        ImpossibleMoveException - in case of no found figure to do the move from gameNotation
